title: Lessons of the Turtle: Living Right Side Up
description: Turtle slips and slides and finally ends upside-down, certain he will die. But while on his back, he learns valuable lessons about how to manage his life. He learns that things really CAN be different. These lessons come in the form of gifts - from the clouds, the trees, the mountain and even a butterfly. Steve Goodier, author of numerous inspirational and persoanl growth books, shows us that "personal" is not a dirty word. LESSONS OF THE TURTLE is informative as well as entertaining. A must read for anyone interested in making needed changes.
author: Steve Goodier
